1.content: Here are five bad dreams I've had. If you're a guy, you'll probably find choices 2 and 3 more exciting. If you're a girl, I suggest you try 1 or 4 for a thrill.
1.title: Where to?

11.content: Your family has decided to move to the other side of the country. You don't really care, but you have a bad feeling about the cheap motel where your parents have decided to spend the night. You wonder if you're going crazy as the old family minivan pulls up to motel office.
11.title: Checking in?

choices: "Get your butt out of the car and into our room!"
"Fine. Stay in there if you want to." *flashes dirty look*
111.content:
"Are you coming, honey?" your mom asks you. You know that what she is really trying to say is, "Get your scrawny butt out of the freaking car right NOW!" But she chose to put it in the form of a question and so you take advantage of it.

"No, Mom. I don't like this motel. It's dingy and dirty...plus it'll probably have beds that sqeak every time you touch it with your fingertip and will cave in on you in the middle of the night. I'm also getting some really negative vibes."

Your mom just smiles. "Aw, honey. Don't think like that...think positively. It won't be so bad once you try it!" She flashes you a heartwarming, disgusting smile.

"No, mom. I'm going to stay in the car and sleep here. I'll be fine; we have food and soda in the cooler and I got my pillow and some books. I'm NOT going in there." You talk slowly to your mom as if she is mentally unstable. However, you still find yourself very convincing.

Suddenly your dad comes to the rear car door.

"What's all the fuss about? C'mon, honey, we're going to our room."

"Dear," your mother starts to tell your father. "Your daughter doesn't want to come. She says she's getting...negative vibes." Your mother says this as if she was talking about cockroaches.

Your dad says:
111.title: Trouble

1111.content:
"Honey, this is silly. You need to come into the motel RIGHT NOW. I already checked it out and it looks fine. Now come on."

You whine to yourself and to your parents but get out of the car anyway. You knew your parents wouldn't understand. Parents never do. Especially your mom. She doesn't believe in that hocus-pocus negative vibes stuff.

You grab your bags and head to the door of your room. The numbers on the door look old and rusty--they read "13".

"Oh, great. What luckier number could we get?" you say to no one in particular.

"C'mon, dear. Superstitions aren't real," your mother says, pushing you into the room.

"Oh right, Mom, I forgot--you're ALWAYS right," you say sarcastically.

"Don't talk to your mother that way," your father snaps. You see your little brother Jordan jumping from one twin bed to the other. "Jordan, get down honey," your dad says. Jordan is only three and doesn't talk much.

"See, isn't this nice?" your father says, putting his hands on his hips and letting out a large breath. With his red checked shirt, large muscles and posture, he looks a little bit like a lumberjack. This makes you chuckle to yourself.

You put your bags down by one of the beds.

"Mom, can I go get a soda?" you ask.

"We have soda in the cooler, honey," your dad says, also putting away his bags.

"But all we have is Diet Coke, Diet Caffeine Free Coke, Diet Coke with Lime, and Diet Coke with Lemon," you say. "Those are totally nasty."

Your mother walks over and hands you four quarters. "Be back in five minutes," she says. "There's a soda machine down the walk a little bit."

"Thanks mom."

"Come straight back! Don't talk to strangers!" your dad calls as you slam the door shut.

"What a loser," you say to yourself.

On your way to the soda machine, you meet:
1111.title: Soda Time

11112.content:
you become attracted to this person
are you?
11112.title: girl or boy?

111121.content:
Your parents soon usher you off to the room. Your mom notices you glimsing at this boy and turns you away, hoping your father didn't see.

This hotel room sucks, you were right. There's not even a TV!

You did see a snack machine and you go to it.

It's all old and the m&m's in the package look like they have long forgotten m&m colors. You decide to pass on the snack machine when the boy walks by again. DO you
111121.title: m&m's

choices: there is a knock on the door
1111212.content: you are back in your hotel room
1111212.title: hotel room

choices: you come back to my room
11112121.content:
I'd just finished changing into my silk pajamas when there was a knock at the door. I went over to it and flung it open, expecting it to be mom or dad come by to either check up on me or to say good-night.

Instead, I was confronted by "the boy"! I stood there, transfixed while he looked me up and down. The cool night air slipping in through the open door danced across my body under the silk, pebbling my nipples.

The thin material did little to cover me, but I grew strangely excited by the way his eyes narrowed and his breathing quickened. He finally wrenched his eyes away from my chest and focused on mine. "Hi!" he whispered huskily, "My name's Mike... Michael. I saw you earlier. I thought you might like to do something..."

"Is there anything to do around here?" I asked.

His eyes were back on my chest, "No. Not really."

"I'm Amy, by the way. So, Michael..." I paused for effect, "What did you have in mind?" While he thought about what to answer, I checked him out. He really was hot! He was about my height, just a bit taller. He had dark, wavy hair and I could tell he had some muscle about him.

His green eyes were back, checking out my breasts. Normally, I get really irritated when a guy does this. I mean, I'm more than a pair of boobs. Tonight, I could feel a strange tingle in my stomach. I wasn't sure where this might lead, but it sure as hell beat sitting around being bored half to death!

Michael said, "Well, how about if..."
11112121.title: Motel Meeting

choices: Wake up, in a strange room.
111121212.content: "Well..." I could hear my parents in the next room. Jordan was hollering because there was a spider, Mom was yelling at dad, and Dad was trying to watch TV.I looked at Micheal, but before I could say anything he looked at me with strange eyes. I listened to his voice slowly drift away, and I felt like I was fading into darkness. What was happening? As the last speck of light drifted away, I watched Mikes face turn to a smile, his teeth glaring. I:
111121212.title: Mike

1111212121.content:
I woke up, totally disoriented. Wherever I was, it was totally black. I couldn't see my hand even when I touched my nose. The air was cool and still, without even a hint of a breeze.

I could feel the goose bumps on my arms and legs as the cool air touched my bare skin. Bare skin?!? I ran my hands over my body. Yep! Bare skin.

I was somewhere, anywhere, nowhere - no idea where and naked as the day I was born! I coouldn't help myself. I screamed! I screamed until I was hoarse! I screamed until I couldn't scream any more!

I tried to feel my way. I shuffled my feet, my arms outstretched. Finally, I touched a wall. It was wet and slimy. I recoiled from it and sat on my heels, crying in fear of what was to become of me.

Off in the distance, I heard, "Tap! Tap! Tap!" It was the sounds of footsteps. I couldn't tell if they were getting closer or not. The sounds echoed all around me! When the voice spoke from only a few feet away, I managed one pitiful squeak of fear as it commanded, "Stand up, bitch!"
1111212121.title: Where am I?

choices: Shake Your Head And Run Out
You Stand Your Ground And Stay
1112.content:
"Fine. Stay in there if you want." He says and smiles crookedly.

"Why did you smile like that?" You ask curiously, almsot dreading the answer.

"What you never heard of the legend of the kid who decided to stay all alone in front of a hotel. Oh my, my." He says.

"Please tell me!" You yell.

"Well, she was about your age you know and like you refused to go inside with her family thinking that something wrong was happening in the spot. Her parents not wanting to make a big fuss left her sleep in the car. She was happy, till the sunset and darkness started to change everything. She started to hear deep breathing. She locked every door and turned on her music." You dad stops. "Are you sure you want to hear?"

"Yes, yes please tell!" You say.

"Okay. Suddenly she start to hear scratching on the windows, not something that any human could do. She moved to the middle, freaking out. Someone knocked on the door, she refused to open the door. The knocking became madder and louder. She started to shake. The person broke the window and opened it slowly. She hid under the covers. The door opened. She heard the loud, slow breathing. She started to debate on what to do. She saw blood drip as she poked her head out, her cat was gutted and as dragged on the ground by a man. She screamed. The guy grabbed her and cut her tongue out. She started to thrash her arms around. He grabbed her right arm and broke the bone and made it snap through the skin." He stops once again, seeing that you are scared.

"Keep going." You say.

"She slunk her arm around trying to get the guy, but he ended up cutting her arm off and her legs off as well. She sobbed till the last drop of blood soaked the car. To make a long story short anyone who stays in a car instead of coming gets killed by the guy. Do you still want to stay in the car?" He asks.

You....
1112.title: The Legend

choices: Tell your parents you want to leave
112.content:
You follow your parents into the motel lobby. As soon as you walk through those swinging doors, you are struck by it's cleanliness. There are no stains on the carpet, no child has carelessly scattered the rack of coloring books next to the front desk, the lobby is uncluttered with fake plants. It is absolutely perfect, and that is exactly what scares you. Museums are perfect. Well kept cemetaries are perfect.

Your creepy feelings are amplified by the fact the lobby is completely deserted. You look at the chair that is turned away from you behind the front desk. Is it empty, or is there someone sitting in it, waiting for you to get close?
112.title: The Lobby

choices: Spy on the weird motel clerk
1121.content:
You creep up to the front desk to press the service bell. That chair has to be empty. Motel clerks are supposed to greet you as soon as you walk in the door. Right? As soon as you press the service bell, the armchair swivels around, and you jump about ten feet in terror.

"Son of a bitch!" you scream. There is someone in the chair, a balding, thin middle aged man. He is expressionless, so you don't know if he was sleeping or playing a prank. He glances at your mom and dad, but stares at you, probably because you screamed. "Sorry,but you scared the crap out of me!"

He doesn't respond, rolling his eyes over to your parents. "Checking in?" he asks.

Your parents pay for a room, and then exit the lobby. You find it odd that the man in the chair just swivels his chair back around. You leave the lobby quickly.
1121.title: Suprise!

choices: Spin the chair around to scare the motel clerk
11212.content:
You tell your parents you want to get a brochure for an amusement park so they can let you go back. They give you permission, and tell you be in Room 19 in fifteen minutes or else.
You walk into the lobby slowly, and stand in front of the clerk's chair, turned away from you. you listen closely, but you don't hear any breathing or movement coming from the chair.
11212.title: Back Again

12.content: It's the future, aproximately 2537 C.E., and somehow it has fallen to you to save the world. The problem is, you're a rock punk from the year 1997, and you have no idea what to do. All you know is some weird old dude from a bookstore gave you an old plastic toy sword, the next thing you know you're in some kind of shopping complex surrounded by people with weird skintight clothing on. You feel out of place with your multicolored hair, baggy skater jeans, and multiple piercings. What do you do?
12.title: Welcome to the future

choices: Drag him out of that suit and wail on his ass!
Curse him out and walk somewhere else
121.content:
You walk into the food court, hungry and confused as hell. Everything is in bright flourescent colors like the mall from your time, but the store fronts are more sophisticated, less gaudy than the 20th century. Everyone is getting food from huge vending machines, and sitting down to eat on collapsible chairs and hovering tables. What freaks you out the most is the appearence of the food. No matter what store it is bought from, it appearance is the same. Unappatizing, sand colored wafers about the size of a plate. When people see you watching them, they stop eating their wafers, and stare back.

"Even in the future I'm a freak." you say to yourself as you walk to a Chinese Food counter. You shrug it off. "Could be worse. They could all be preps."

"Are you all right?" asks a man in line with you. He's wearing the same full body suit as everyone else, in the same color, metallic silver. The only area of his body uncovered is his pale face. "Do you know who you are?"

In your time, the appropriate answer to anything an adult would ask you would be a shrug, or at most a grunt, but you feel it is important to answer the man. "My name is Thomas Lovejoy. And I'm cool." You say in a low tone.

"Thomas isn't a modern name." says the man. "Are you sure your name isn't something else, like Sturges, or Quinton?"

"I know what the hell my name is!" you tell him going off. "What the hell kind of question is that?!"
The man whispers something to a woman who is about the same age as him, then turns back to you. "I think you've gotten out of Stasis too soon. Why don't you go back to the hospital where the doctors can treat you?" He says it in the tone one would use with a nine-year old. You consider kicking his ass, but you don't know the rules of this place. For all you know, throwing down in the future could give you a one way ticket to death row. Or whatever they call it here.
121.title: WTF? Wafers!

1212.content:
"You know what fuck this. And take that goddam suit off you condom looking asshole! You made me lose my appetite, and I really wanted some Kung Pao chicken but that is probably looks like those dry bricks you call good food!" He screamed angrily, causing everyone in the food court to look at him as he stormed off angrily. The man was standing there shocked at the language the strange person had used. Those words were supposed to be wiped out of his memory during his time in Stasis.
"Stop that man and force him back into Stasis!" He yelled as Thomas was trudging his way past shocked and confused man and women alike.
The people got up from their chairs and started to chase after Thomas. That was when he bolted, but since he didn't know this place he soon found himself cornered.
"Shit! What the fuck is going on here! Ijust wanted some real food!"
"You are not ready, you must go back into stasis." All of his pursuers said in a monotonous tone.
He frantically looked around and saw something he didn't think would be there; a simple air vent. It would be a tight squeeze, but it would work. The only problem was that the people were closing in on him quickly. That's when the dumbest idea popped into his mind; to kick one of them and see what happens.
"Come and get me you fucking rubbers!" He shouted, only further provoking the crowd of people
1212.title: Curse him out and walk somewhere else

122.content:
"ok...." You're thinking about this, "I need to, I need to look like all these other people.

But when you walk around the store, you notice that it's all clothing for children. You are horribly uncomfortable with this and some of the parents are starting to hold their children protectively. You give a quick nod of apology and leave.

"Save the world? I guess if I'm supposed to save the world, some sort of costume is in order, and I already don't look like anyone else." You decide to keep your current clothing and then decide to have a quick look at the future. You wander..
122.title: clothing

1222.content: You wander around the mall, searching for things to give you a clue as to what you're supposed to be doing. That's when you notice a mall fortune teller, it's more extravagant than the ones in your time, but the principal behind it is the same. You decide to
1222.title: fortune teller

12222.content: there is a strange shop in the mall
12222.title: strange shop

122221.content: someone is waiting there for you
122221.title: something is wrong

1222211.content:
but this boy is strange, he is wearing a bath robe
talk to him?
1222211.title: friendly boy

13.content:
In 2308, invading planets and exploiting it's lifeforms and materials as resources for humans is big business. You are a part of Earth's Continuous Reconnaissance Until Successful Takeover, or Earth's C.R.U.S.T. for short. Your job is to scout out far off planets to see if Earth's global military can afford to invade and take over.
This time, your job is to scout out the resources on Majorus Rex, the biggest planet in a newly discovered solar system. You strap yourself into your small space vessel, disguised to look like an escape pod so advanced lifeforms of Majorus Rex will be less suspicious of your arrival.
"I hope like hell we don't end up in another waterhole." says Riku Typhoon, a guy who's been on the last ten missions with you, all on liquid based planets. He's in the vessel next to you.
"Well this planet is solid on the surface, with a few scattered lakes and rivers. I wouldn't worry about it." You tell him, repeating the data collected from a satellite orbiting the planet.
"That's the same crap they gave us about Ceasarus X. And what do you know? The satellites had gone to hell, and the planet's liquid based with only a ten-mile island of sapphire! If this planet is water based, I quit."
Water planets are notorious for making short work of C.R.U.S.T. members, because the inhabitants of them are usually hostile and less likely to be humanoid. You agree with Typhoon. If this mission is bogus, you are quitting the squadron.
13.title: The mission

choices: It's nothing, just some alien plant life
132.content:
You land on the surface of the planet in about two feet of water. You immediately grab your C.L.R.(Concentrated Laser Rifle). You know from experience that there are usually hostile organisms in water. You look around you quickly. There are other space vessels around, but they are all empty.
"Hey, Narco!" calls Riku from dry land 500 feet away. "We just landed in a small pool! This planet's solid!" Riku jumps up and down, kissing the magenta colored sand. You start to walk towards him when you feel something wrap around your boots.
132.title: A solid Planet!

1321.content: so this allien plant has to be checked
1321.title: allien plant

13212.content:
You pull out your DNA Plant reader and check the plant. It doesn't seem to show any signs of being agressive, so you try to move on. There's only one problem, it still has a grip on your boots and won't let go.

You give a tug, but suddenly more of the plants wrap around your ankles and you have no choice but to step out of the boots. Was this a good idea though?
13212.title: stepping out

132121.content:
You reach down and grab your boots with both hands and pull them free. Finally you have them, but you feel something slowly slide around your ankles.

It seems you have the boots, but now the plants have you. Kicking, you try to pull free, but the mischevious little shrubs seem to be playing a game.
132121.title: What the heck?

choices: Wait until lifeforms are found on the surface
1322.content:
You point your C.L.R. down at your feet and pray to whatever god you worship that you don't miss. By pure luck you get the damned thing. You waste no time getting the hell out of the waterhole and onto dry land with Riku and the rest of your C.R.U.S.T. team.
"What the hell was that?" asked Riku, ripping the squirming remnants of the tentacle from your foot.
"I don't know, but I'm not about to find out."
you say, trying to wring the water out of your clothes. "I thought I was gonna lose my left foot!"
You turn to Marrow Tybia, the communications expert. "Can you find any forms of life here?"

Tybia taps furiously on his heatfinding equipment before answering. "I got nothing. At least not on the surface." He squints at the analysis screen and hits it. "Damn. That can't be right. It says here that there are some readings in caverns underneath the water."

Riku blows his top. "That's it! This is my last mission! I'll do whatever I have to do to get out of this company!"

"Relax, Typhoon. The closest one is a twenty feet down from that pool over there." Marrow points at the waterhole you barely got out of.

What next?
1322.title: Signs of life

choices: You reach the caverns without a fight
13222.content:
"This means that whatever grabbed me is still down there." you say, not exactly overjoyed to go back in the water.

"You act like you've never killed a creature with tentacles before." Marrow tells you.

"I have. The problem is, everytime I get one, I get that much closer to losing a piece of my ass!" you tell Marrow, holding your fingers an inch apart.

"Look, if it will make you feel better, I have a L.I.G.H.T.(Lightning Increased Great Hyper Type) Bomb."
says Marrow, taking the small cylindrical device out of his gear bag.

"Ooo baby." you tell him, sarcastically rolling your eyes. "You're getting me excited."

"Well keep on your space shorts, baby, here it goes!" He turns the little metal dial on the bottom of the bomb to get the lightning going, then throws it into the water. The brown, murky water pulses with the bomb's current, then stills. Suddenly, four tentacles break through the water's surface, tremble with the electricity flowing through them, then collapse, sinking past the water.

"Marrow? Have you been holding out on us?" Typhoon asks.

"With all the fatalities from the water planets, the big guys at CRUST decided to help us out." Marrow throws a tiny dime-sized rock into the water hole. "They included these little babies called 'floaters'. Each one can draw in the electricity of five bombs, if neccesary. This way we won't get zapped." All the electricity is being absorbed into the rock like it's some kind of minature black hole.

The three of you put on your water gear, adjust your weapons, and dive in. The rest of your team is staying on the surface to look for other signs of life.
13222.title: Me? Go back in there?

choices: You see the one you love with someone else
You see him talking to another nobleman
He's on a horse galloping toward your estate
14.content:
You are a young woman from the middle ages who is supposed to marry a older man, a marquis. You are pissed off because you are in love with somone else, but because your father wants a higher status, he's marrying you to the marquis.
It is the night before your wedding, and all you want to do is see the one you love one last time.
Since his estate is far away from yours, you decide to work a little magic. You take the lock of hair your love has given to you, and dip it into a silver bowl of water. After reciting a spell, your reflection vanishes, and in it's place:
14.title: Longing for him

choices: Run away to become a nun
141.content:
Amayla, your best friend, is holding Jonothan closely. His back is to you, but you can clearly tell he is crying; his shoulders heave with every sob.
A tear escapes your eye. You can't bear to see him in such pain. You almost turn away, but you see Amayla reaching for something on her bodice. You look a little closer, causing ripples in the image with your breath.
"Jonothan," Amaya coos softly, gently pushing his head backwards. To your horror, she unlaces her dress and pulls it gently to her waist.
What the fuck is this?{/i} you think to yourself. The look on Jonothan's face mirrors your disgust.
"You little whore! I have little use for your pendulous, misshapen breasts now? What comfort are you? Get the hell out!" Jonothan roars, pushing Amayla, half-naked to the waist, to the door.

Amayla looks bewildered and rushes to put her dress back on.

"You fucking dog!" She finally yells at him, throwing a shoe at his head. "What is the difference between then and now? Now we are free to be together! You told me you never really wanted her in the first place!"

You watch as Jonothan's eyes turn to steel and he sets his jaw tightly.
"You," He spits between clenched teeth,"Were never more than a Fuck. Anjani was who I really loved. I was saving her for marriage."

"You? Marry Anjani? You never had a snowball's chance in Hell!" Amayla says as she snatches her shoe from the floor, and rushes out the door.

The image fades from the bowl, and you sink slowly to the floor.
141.title: A friendly discourse

choices: Wait for him in your room
Go down to the dining hall
142.content:
"I bought a knife, Leopold." says your love to his best friend.
" The deed that you are planning will surely send you to hell, Jacque! Is there no other way?"
"No!" Jacque sits down in a chair that you recognize from your dining hall. "If I can't have Viva, no will! I'll kill her before I let that disgusting marquis lay a finger on her!"

You cover your mouth in horror. Jacque is here in your home, and he's come to kill you!
142.title: Knight in shining armor?

choices: You let Jacque and Leopold in
1421.content:
You watch the bowl for a bit longer. Maybe he's just so upset over the thought of losing you, that he's talking crazy.

You're right. Jacque eventually breaks down and cries, letting the knife fall from his hands. You are relieved that he really loves you, and this make you cry. You feel sick at the thought of another man touching you, making you happy. You literally want to throw up at the thought of marrying the old nobleman.

You are distracted from your own misery when you notice Jacque and Leopold hear something. It must be your fatther's servants who double as guards(your family isn't rich enough to afford real guards)! If they see your love and his friend downstairs, they will kill first and take names later. Jacque and Leopold understand this, so it's a good thing they know your home so well. They duck out of the dining hall through the kitchen, look both ways before crossing the narrow servant's corridor, then make their way up the tiny staircase to your room.

You remove Jacque's hair from the bowl of water, and go to answer the door.
1421.title: He's only upset

choices: Keep it partway closed, they cannot get through whithout force.
14212.content: You open your door and stare at them. You try to talk but no sound can come out. You let them inside and slowly close the door as the men come raging up the stairs. "Hide..." your mouth says, as a pounding sounds at the door. Leopold chooses the curtain, while Jacque runs and crouches behind your bed. You open the door:
14212.title: Hide!

choices: Leopold moves his footand the guards make their way in.
The guards turn away sniggering and retreat down the stairs.
142122.content: "Is there a problem boys?" you ask, smiling. You bide your time. "We heard noises..." says the one man, holding his torch trying to beckon light into your room. "We came up to see if there was a disturbance." You open the door a little wider, giving your cleavage a chance to woo them. The night is cold. "Now kind sirs, you know if there were to be a problem, why would I fret when I have two big, handsome men to protect me? I assure you there is not problem, you must leave."
142122.title: Hello boys

choices: Attempt to leave the corridor and escape?
144.content: You stare at the vision, the water making a slight glare as your love stabs the knife further into your father. You attempt to scream, but you are too horrified. All of the sudden, he looks up. You see his eyes start to race around the room. Suddenly he stares right at you! His glare burns a hole through your soul. He arises from your father, and makes his way out the corridor. A shudder escapes your body. He is coming for you. Will you:
144.title: Shock

info.brief_description: What would you do if you were having a bad dream?
info.description:
I don't know about any of you, but I always get into a bad situation when I'm asleep. Here are my creepiest dreams. Take them where you want.

Note: Don't add an addition just to see someone change genders. That is the only thing I will delete. Sex, blood, gore, everything else goes!
